attributes.action: Prison sentences for those who abuse animals including teens in young offenders
attributes.background: Animals do not have voice to speak out about being abused. Poor defenceless animals are abused and the law does nothing to stop this. The sick individuals who do this go unpunished. How can we allow this to happen? There must be justice for those without a voice.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament don't decide on the sentences for individual crimes. Sentencing in individual cases is the responsibility of the courts, which are independent. 

You could start a petition asking Parliament to change the law, to set a minimum prison sentence for people convicted of animal abuse.
